member.name: N:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack
member.summary: The Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack namespace contains a variety of non-system themes, including Office 2007 and Windows Media Player 11.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack.Office2007BlackTheme
member.summary: Represents the black Office 2007 theme, which blends perfectly into any Office 2007-like application (see also ElementalBlackTheme).
member.remarks: Figure 1: Card view in Office 2007 Black theme

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack.Office2007BlackTheme.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Office2007BlackTheme class.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack.Office2007BlueTheme
member.summary: Represents the blue Office 2007 theme, which blends perfectly into any Office 2007-like application (see also ElementalBlueTheme).
member.remarks: Figure 1: Table view in Office 2007 Blue theme

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack.Office2007BlueTheme.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Office2007BlueTheme class.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack.Office2007SilverTheme
member.summary: Represents the silver Office 2007 theme, which blends perfectly into any Office 2007-like application (see also ElementalSilverTheme).
member.remarks: Figure 1: Compact-card view in Office 2007 Silver theme

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack.Office2007SilverTheme.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Office2007SilverTheme class.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack.WMP11Theme
member.summary: Represents the Windows Media Player 11 theme.
member.remarks: Figure 1: Table view in Windows Media Player 11 theme

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.ThemePack.WMP11Theme.#ctor
